16956.「ぐへへ……すげえ。こいつは すげえ。\n こんなもんが 床下に 隠されてたなん:
Hehehe...amazing, just amazing. I had no
idea somethin' like this was hidden under the
floor. Isn't this the teacher's... Ehehe...

16957.「あんちゃん……。\n オ…オイラ なんだか ムズムズしちまう……。:
Yeah, bro...
Just...looking at it has me all tingly...

16959.「……なんだ <pc>か。\n 先生かと思ったぜ。おどろかせやがって。:
...Is that you, <pc>?
I thought you were the teacher!
You really scared me.

16960.「……なんだ 先生かと思ったぜ。\n おどろかせやがって。:
...What are you doing? I thought you were
the teacher! You really scared me.

16961.「へへ…… じつは 掃除してたら\n すげえもんが 出てきてよう。\n な お前:
Heh, heh... Actually, I found somethin' pretty
great while I was looking around.
Hey, you wanna see it too?<yesno><close>

16962.「じゃあ いいや。\n おい コノタ。早く 続きを見ようぜ。:
Well, whatever. Suit yourself.
Come on, Konota. Let's hurry up and read
the rest.

16963.「待ってよ あんちゃん。\n オイラ まだ ちゃんと見れてないよ……。:
Wait a sec, bro... I haven't had a chance to
get a good look at it yet...

16966.「生涯をかけて 君を幸せにしたい。\n 神代の間にて 願いが 天に通じたなら\n:
"I wish to dedicate the rest of my days making you happy. If my wish within the Hall of Old reaches the heavens, then let us meet on
that promised hill."

16967.「そして 永遠を約束する 誓いの盃を\n ふたりで 交わそう……だってさ！:
"And then, let’s exchange the oath of
eternity with a sacred cup...together!"

16969.「あんたたち……。\n こんな時だっていうのに ずいぶん楽しそうね。:
You two seem to be enjoying yourselves for
such a difficult time...

16970.「あら <pc>さん！ 来てたのね。:
Oh my, <pc>! I didn't know you
were here.

16971.「大変なのよ。じつは ヒメア様が\n 重い病を わずらってしまって……。:
It's a big problem. Himea has been seriously
ill...

16972.「あら…… あなたは 旅の方かしら。: Oh... You must be a traveler.

16973.「今 このツスクルの村は 大変なの。\n 村を統べる 巫女ヒメア様が\n 重い病:
The village is in pretty big trouble right
now. Lady Himea, the maiden and head of
our village, is seriously ill...

16974.「ヒメア様は ５００年も生きておられる\n 尊い巫女さまなのよ。病に倒れるなんて:
She is a sacred maiden who's been alive for
500 years. She's never fallen ill before, not
even once...

16975.「それで今 ヒメア様を助けるために\n 従者の方が ウデききの旅人を 探している:
So now, for us to help her...her attendant is
looking for a skilled traveler. If you're
able, please lend her a hand.

16977.「おひさしぶりです。同室だった アカシです！\n まさか <pc>さんの \n:
It's been a while. I'm Akashi, your old
roommate! I never thought I'd be able
to help you out one day, <pc>...

16978.「あたし 精一杯 がんばります！\n 薬の調合なら まかせてくださいね。:
I will do my best! If you need help mixing
medicines, you can leave it to me.

16981.「あなたは…… ハイ <pc>さんですね。\n <pc>さんの お役に立てるよう:
You must be... <pc>, yes!
I'll do the best I can to help!

16982.「さっそく 知恵の社に 向かいましょう。\n 知恵の社は この村を出て\n ずっ:
Let's head for the Shrine of Wisdom right
away. It's far to the west of the village.

16994.「ふうふう…… やっと 追いつきました。\n 知恵の社に到着ですね。さっそく\n:
Phew... Finally caught up to you. We have
arrived at the shrine. Let's split up and
look for the book of pharmacology.

16998.「あっ…… ハイ その……。\n <pc>さんと 一緒に ヒメア様の\n お薬を:
Hi, I'm supposed to prepare Himea-sama's
medicine together with <pc>. We've
come to...

17003.「ほらっ 見てください 薬学の書です！\n ………って あれ？\n その本が ど:
Look, look, it's a book of pharmacology!
What's that? What's wrong with the book?

17004.「へえ…… 不思議な本ですね。\n 封印が かかっていて\n 中が読めないように:
Wow... it's a mysterious book. It looks like
it's sealed so that you can't read inside.

17006.「なんだか 気になるし\n 学びの庭に持ちかえって\n 後で 調べてみましょう。:
I'm curious about it, so let's take it back to
the garden of learning and check it out later.
See?

17008.「……さて。それより今は 薬学の書です。\n この本によれば 仙者の霊薬を作るに:
...Well. But for now, let's look at the book of pharmacology. According to this book, you need fossilized omizus to make the elixir of
the Immortals.

17009.「おおみみずの化石とは キリカ草原などにいる\n <%sEV_QUE_NAME0:
Wiggly Fossil is an item sometimes dropped by
Mandrake Major in Kirika Steppe and other
places. <pc>, please procure it.

17010.「あたしは 薬の調合の 準備をしておきます。 \n 化石が手に入ったら あたしの:
I'll start preparing the potion. When you
get the fossil, bring it to me in my room...
It's in the dormitory in Tsuskuru!

17018.「そんな…… あたしは\n まだ一人前じゃないのに ヒメア様に\n お会いするな:
I'm not ready to be on my own yet, and I'm
afraid to meet you, Himea...

17027.「それでは 次は お待ちかね……\n 知恵の社で見つけた本の封印を\n 解いてみ:
So, next up, we await... the unsealing of the
book we found at the shrine!

17773.「うえっへっへ…… じつはな。\n オレ ラブレターを見つけちゃったんだよ。\n:
Hee hee hee... It's actually a love letter
I found. It's pretty old and beat up.

17774.「ちげえよ あんちゃん！\n 見つけたのは オイラだろ！: No way, bro! I'M the one that found it!

17775.「ひゅーっ！！ ケツが かゆくなるぜ！: Whewww! My face is red just reading it!

17776.「くわしい話は この学びの庭を出て 東……\n 村はずれにある ヒメア様の お屋:
If you want to know more, leave the Garden of
Learning and head east to Lady Himea's
mansion... You can ask Yonja there.

17777.「では そなたの手伝いとして\n 学徒のアカシを 同行させよう。\n まだ年若い:
Take Akashi with you to help. She is
still a young student, but her knowledge
will be useful.

17778.「さっそく 知恵の社に 向かいましょう。\n <pc>さんなら わかりますよね。:
Let's head over to the Shrine of Wisdom.
You know the way, don't you? The shrine
is located west of the village.

17779.「はじめまして。お手伝いの アカシです。\n えっと…… まだまだ 修行中の身で:
Nice to meet you! I'm Akashi. Umm...
I'm still learning, but if you need help
mixing medicine, you can leave it to me.

17780.「準備が できたら すぐに追いかけますから\n <pc>さんは 先に\n 知恵の:
I'll follow behind you as soon as I'm ready.
Please go on ahead to the shrine.

17782.「……おや。アカシ君じゃないか。\n こんな所で会うとは めずらしいね。\n な:
Oh...well. It's Akashi, isn't it? It's rare to
see you here. Are you looking for something?

17783.「それは 大役だね。\n 落ち着いて いつも通りに がんばりなさい。\n 日々の:
That's a big role. Stay calm and do your best
as usual. Your daily efforts will not betray
you.

17785.「ハッ！！ す すみません。\n ……今のは 学びの庭に 最近いらっしゃった\n:
Ha! I'm sorry. ...This is Mr. Hajika, a new
teacher who recently arrived at the Garden of
Learning.

17786.「ハジカ先生は すごいんですよ！\n 薬学から 古代文字まで なんにでも精通して:
Dr. Hajika is a great teacher! He knows
everything from pharmacology to ancient
scripts.

17787.「もう 他の先生も 目を白黒させてるくらい。\n ああいう人を 天才っていうんで:
Other teachers were already looking at him
with black and white eyes. I guess they call
such a person a genius.

17788.「……と ごめんなさい！\n そんなことより 早く\n 薬学の書を 探さなくちゃ:
...and I'm sorry! I'll have to look for the
book of pharmacology as soon as possible.

17789.「それじゃ あたしは １階を探してみます。\n <pc>さんは ２階の本棚を\n:
Okay, I'll search the 1F. <pc> should
check the bookshelves on the 2F.

17790.<pc>は 本を読もうとした。\nしかし 不思議なチカラで\n本は かたく 閉ざ:
<pc> tried to read a book. However,
the book seems to have stubbornly closed by
some mysterious force.

17791.「ふっふっふ。でも まかせてください！\n だいぶ 封印が弱まってるみたいですし:
Hmmm... But leave it to me! The seal seems to
have weakened considerably, and I think I can
break this much.

58682.「おおっ 仙者の霊薬が 完成したのか！\n よくやってくれたな <pc> アカシ:
Oh, the elixir of the Immortals is complete!
Well done <pc> Akashi.

58683.「さあ ついてきなさい。\n その霊薬は そなたたちの手で\n ヒメア様に お渡:
Now follow me. The elixir can be given to
Himea with your own hands.

58684.「遠慮は無用だ。\n そなたも 苦労して 霊薬を作ったのだろう？\n さあ モタ:
Don't be shy. You too must have worked hard to
create the elixir, right? Now, don't be slow.

58685.「巫女ヒメア様が お倒れになるなど\n ５００年間 一度として なかったこと……:
The Maiden Himea has never fallen in 500
years... even to the villagers. Anxiety is
spreading among the villagers.

58686.「だが この霊薬があれば もう心配はいらん。 \n 心から 礼を言うぞ。:
But with this elixir, you need not worry
anymore. I thank you from the bottom of my
heart.

58687.「ヒメア様！ <pc>と アカシが\n 仙者の霊薬を 持ってまいりました！:
Dear Himea! <pc> and Akashi have
brought the elixir of the Immortals!

58689.「ケホッコホッ…… そうですか。\n 私のために 仙者の霊薬を……。:
Kehokoho... I see. For me, the elixir of the
Immortals...

58690.「しかし 仙者の霊薬では\n この病を 治すことはできません。:
But the elixir of the Immortals cannot cure
this disease.

58691.「風たちが 告げているのです。\n 私の役割が 終わるのだと……。:
The winds are telling me. That my role in this
world is coming to an end.

58692.「私の命は もう まもなく尽きるでしょう。\n これは ５００年前に 決まった\:
My life will soon be over. This is the
inevitable fate that was decided 500 years
ago.

58693.「……しかし そなたたちの 優しさは\n この身体に しみわたりました。\n 礼:
But your kindness has soaked into my body. I
thank you. <pc> Akashi.

58694.「私のことは 案ずるに およびません。 \n さあ お行きなさい。: Don't worry about me. Now go.

58695.「すまなかったな ふたりとも……。 \n 用意してもらった 仙者の霊薬は\n 私:
I'm sorry, both of you... but I will take back
the elixir of the Immortals you prepared for
me.

58696.「心ばかりの品だが この <%sEV_FEE_ITEM_A>を\n 受け取ってく:
This is a small gift, but please accept this Urbea Silver Coin. I'll leave it with Akashi, so you can divide it between the two of you
later.

58697.「役割が 終わるって……。\n ヒメア様が 死んじゃうってことでしょうか。\n:
Does it mean that Himea-sama is going to die?
No way...that can't happen, right?

58698.「あっ そうだ！\n そういえば 知恵の社で見つけた\n 不思議な本を 持ってき:
Oh, that's right! I remember I had brought a
mysterious book I found at the Shrine of
Wisdom.

58699.「ねえ <pc>さん。\n あの本の 封印を解いて 読んでみましょうよ。:
Hey <pc>. Let's get that book
unsealed and read it.

58700.「ヨンジャさまから いただいた\n <%sEV_FEE_ITEM_A>も 分けた:
I want to share the Urbea Silver Coin that
Yonja gave me, so let's go to my room.

58701.「来ましたね <pc>さん。\n まずは ヨンジャさまから いただいた\n <%:
Here we are <pc>. First, let's share
the Urbea Silver Coin that we received from
Yonja.

58702.「ハイ どうぞ！\n これが <pc>さんの分です。: Hi, here you go! This is for <pc>.

58703.「おいっ チビのアカシ！\n オレたち すげえ物 見つけちまったんだ！\n な・:
Hey, little Akashi! We found something cool!
It's an old love letter!

58704.「床下から 大発見したんだぜ！: We just made a big discovery under the floor!

58705.「ふうん。でも あたしたちだって\n とっても いいもの 見つけたんですから。\:
Hmm. But we found something really nice too.
Right? <pc>!

58706.「あ…… できた！！\n <pc>さん 見てください！\n 本が 開きましたよ！:
Ah... it's done! <pc> Look! The book
is open!

58707.「はぁーん？ その本が オレたちが見つけた \n ラブレターに匹敵する いいもの:
Huh? You think that book is as good as the
love letters we found? Then read it.

58708.「それじゃ 読みますね。ええと……\n エルトナの東端 ツスクルの村の地下には\:
I'll give it a read. Let's see...
"In the eastern Eltona lies Tsuskuru Village. Underneath this village lies the Hall of Old, a place of great power."

58709.「かの地では 古来より 大がかりな秘術が\n 行われてきた。あの部屋は エルフの:
"Many a secret art have been practiced in that
place since time immemorial. That room holds
the history of Elves, and a great treasure."

58710.「その神代の間を……ざす……とは\n あの方は ご乱心 なされ……ろうか。:
"To dare defile...the Hall of Old...
Have they lost...their sanity...?"

58711.「……だそうです。\n これ以上は ボロボロで\n とても 読めそうにありません:
...That's all I can make out.
The book is really beat up so I can't
read the rest.

58712.「ツスクルの村に 地下があるって？\n そんなの 聞いたことないぞ。\n おいお:
Underneath Tsuskuru? Never heard of such a
thing... Hey, wait... Isn't this some big-time
discovery?

58713.「地下に眠る 謎の部屋 神代の間……。\n その存在を知って オレは 震えたね。:
The mysterious God's Hall that lies in the basement... I was trembling when I learned of its existence. This was the beginning of an
adventure.

58714.「……でも それが\n とんだ 大まちがいだったのさ。: But it turned out to be a big mistake.

58715.「この時の オレに\n なにか 言ってやれるもんなら\n オレは こう言ってやり:
Steel Lance, if I could say something to
myself at this time, I would say this.

58716.「神代の間には 関わるな……ってな。: Don't get involved in God's Hall...
